Learn more. 4.9 / 5 Stars Love this! “Great app! My husband and I are full-time RV’rs (RV-N-Free) and this is the PERFECT app to use while traveling the US.” — RV-N-Free An start Focus on your road trip “This app really brings the trip home on a personal level.” — Ron TG A traveling companion not to be missed “My family and I travel often & the stories we hear are informative & interesting. Even listening near my home has introduced me to things I didn’t know. ” — CAMSWPhD Enjoy 5 Stories Free - Tap for Plans Create Your Account Cancel Autio offers 30 Day & 3 Year\nplans that don’t automatically renew,\nas well as an annual subscription. See Plans Up Next You’ll need a subscription to create playlists, as well as bookmark, favorite, or download stories. Search MOST POPULAR The Perfect Gift for the Adventurer in Your Life Schedule delivery ahead of time (or at the last minute). Give the timeless gift of storytelling, travel inspiration, and great conversation. Give the Gift of Autio Send 20% Off to a Friend ACCOUNT STATUS No Plan Selected Profile Personal Information Change Password Current Password New Password Confirm Password Categories Prioritize your interests for AUTIO to recommend more relevant types of stories Save Changes Name Contact Log Out Delete My Account Continue As Guest Update
Welcome, explorer! Autio is a location-based\naudio app that alerts you to exciting\nstories along your journey.\n\nWe’ll need a few permissions\nto get started… Every place has a story.\nNow every story has a place. Notifications In-App Location Background Location So you\'ll know when you’re near a story\nyou\'ve never heard before. Select “precise” and “while using the app” to discover nearby stories, especially on road. Background location gives you the best experience. The magic of Autio is discovering stories as you drive even if you’re not using the app. Let Autio use your location, even if you’re in your favorite navigation or music apps. We never share or sell your location information to third parties. Location inaccurate. Tap to enable ‘Always On’ to ensure relevant story notifications. Traveler - only $3/month* 1 YEAR SUBSCRIPTION • $35.99 paid annually You\'ll be reminded before renewal. You can cancel any time. 35% OFF, BEST VALUE Single Trip 30 DAYS PASS • $29.99 One-time payment. Adventurer 3 YEAR MEMBER • $107.97 $69.99 One-time payment. You\'re not currently signed in.\nCreate an account or sign in to\nmanage your account. Questions about your account or subscription? Contact Autio. Pick a story from the map Bookmarked stories will appear on this list. Bookmarks are only visible to you and are a great way to earmark stories to revisit later. Liked stories will appear on this list. Everyone can see likes — they’re a great way to show some love for your absolute favorite stories. Listened-to stories will appear here in the order you discover them. Start listening now by choosing a story from the map. Tap the “…” by any story to download the audio content for offline use. Help the Next Generation\nTell Their Stories Autio is a proud sponsor of The Moth Community Engagement Program, which provides the space, tools and expertise for people to practice the art and craft of personalstorytelling. We partner with community organizations, cultural institutions and non-profits to host workshops that inspire confidence and self-reflection and deepen connections within and between communities.

Take your journey to the next level with location-based audio stories
Go anywhere with nationwide coverage
Always more to discover with new original content
A collection of narrators as unique as the stories
Explore our collection of over 10,000+ stories exclusive to Autio.
Road trip across the country with new stories to discover wherever you travel.
New, unique stories added weekly.
Listen to some of your favorite voices, like Kevin Costner, Phil Jackson, & John Lithgow.
